sphinxter.Reader¶

class sphinxter.Reader¶

Static class for reading doc strings and comments into dict’s

static parse(docstring)¶

Parses a docstring into YAML, default to description

Parameters:

docstring – the docstring (or string after an attribute)

Returns:

The parsed doctring

Return type:

dict

Usage

static source(resource)¶

Extracts the source, removing any overall indent

Parameters:

resource (module or function or class or method) – what to extract the source from

Returns:

The non-indented source

Return type:

str

Usage

If you have a subclass like:

class Complex:

    class Subber:

        pass

The source for Subber would be indented from inspect.getsource() which can’t be parsed properly because of the initial indent:

inpsect.getsource(Complex.Subber)
#     class Subber:
#
#          pass

This prevents that problem:

sphinxter.Reader.source(Complex.Subber)
# class Subber:
#
#  pass
